thread.title: Nancy Couture Named Delivery Enablement Lead at Datasource Consulting
thread.title_full: Nancy Couture Named Delivery Enablement Lead at Datasource Consulting

author: Suzanne Gentner
title: Nancy Couture Named Delivery Enablement Lead at Datasource Consulting
text:
Datasource Consulting, LLC, a well-respected consulting firm specializing in Business Intelligence and Enterprise Data Management, proudly announces the addition of Nancy Couture to our talented team. Nancy joined Datasource at the end of September as Delivery Enablement Lead for the growing consulting firm. In her new role, Nancy will leverage her extensive experience in the Business Intelligence industry to develop and refine Datasource’s methodologies, internal competencies and training to ensure more effective and efficient project delivery.
Nancy has over 30 years of experience leading Enterprise Data Management practices in both Fortune 500 and mid-sized companies. She was the Vice President of Data Management Solutions at UnitedHealth Group in Connecticut and was most recently the Vice President of Business Intelligence at SquareTwo Financial in Denver.
During her tenure at SquareTwo Financial, Nancy developed and implemented a BI strategy and roadmap for the organization. As part of the strategy, Nancy oversaw the development of a new enterprise data warehouse as well as an active data governance program. She also led an internal team to build a robust reporting capability that included standard report distribution, cubes for self-service reporting and dashboards.
Nancy is currently the acting president of the TDWI Colorado Chapter and has published several articles in the TDWI Business Intelligence Journal. She is a respected authority in the Business Intelligence industry and has repeatedly presented at notable industry events including Information on Demand, Teradata, Health Care Data Warehousing Association and MIT Information Quality Conference.
When asked about the opportunity, Nancy said, “Datasource Consulting has an excellent reputation in the Enterprise Data Management area, with a focus on delivering high quality solutions. They employ the best and brightest consultants and provide superior thought leadership in all areas of Enterprise Data Management. I’m very excited to join Datasource. This opportunity will enable me to continue to expand my knowledge and expertise as well as contribute to Datasource’s continuing success.”
Steve Dine, Founder and Managing Partner, said, “I’ve admired Nancy’s work and leadership in the BI/DW industry for a number of years. She has deep experience in both the Finance and Healthcare industries, which are key areas of growth for Datasource. I’m looking forward to working with Nancy and watching her flourish as a consultant and Delivery Enablement leader.”
About Datasource Consulting, LLC
Datasource Consulting is a consulting company that focuses exclusively on Enterprise Data Management and Business Intelligence, including both strategic and implementation services. They are experts in data warehousing, data architecture, data governance, data integration, data quality, MDM (master data management), reporting & analytics, and program management. Founded in 2005, the company has offices in both Denver and San Diego. To learn more about Datasource Consulting, visit us at http://www.DatasourceConsulting.com , or contact us at: info@datasourceconsulting.com.
END -
